channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: COMM+D Offering Free Research Poster Design Workshop
item.description: The Center for Communication+Design (COMM+D) is offering a FREE workshop on designing research posters. Learn guidelines and strategies from experts will make your poster stand out. Bring your posters to be reviewed. Join us March 19 at 4pm in Sage 4711.
item.author: Students

item.title: Game Development Club Presents Analog GameJam!
item.description: We’re shaking things up! Join the RPI Game Development Club in Sage 2411 (VAST) for an out-of-the-box Game Jam, and make an Analog Game in 48 hours! Overnight breaks begin at 10:00 PM on both Friday and Saturday nights, and doors re-opening at 8:00 AM each morning. This event is open to RPI students of all majors and all levels of experience! Please contact club president, Aiden Crossfield (crossa2@rpi.edu) for more information and to sign up.
item.author: Students

item.title: Darrin Counseling Award Nominations are Open until March 15
item.description: The Darrin Counseling Award was established in 1972 to recognize a faculty member who has made an unusual/exceptional contribution in the counseling of undergraduate students. The selection of the award recipient is made by Phalanx, the student leadership honorary society, based on nominations from the campus community. Nominations are open until March 15th at 11:59pm. Nominate a deserving faculty member
item.author: Students

item.title: ALAC is now hiring for 2025-2026 Learning Assistants!
item.description: Want to help others? ALAC is seeking Learning Assistants for first- and sophomore-year students. Apply now for the 2025-2026 academic year: https://surveys.rpi.edu/jfe/form/SV_6tirmQxKIQx1Y46
item.author: Students

item.title: Semiconductor Careers Summit to be held on March 26 at 3PM!
item.description: Join the CCPD and select employers for a day focused on semiconductor careers! The events begin with an industry overview at 3:15pm in EMPAC and will continue through 8pm, featuring a panel, raffles, and networking. Log into Handshake for more details.
item.author: Students

item.title: Epic Info Session to be held Tuesday, March 18 at 6:45PM
item.description: Join the CCPD and Epic on Tuesday, March 18th from 6:45-7:45pm to learn about careers with the company! Details and registration can be found in Handshake.
item.author: Students

item.title: GE Vernova Info Session to be held March 18 at 5:30PM
item.description: On Tuesday, March 18th from 5:30-6:30pm, GE Vernova will be hosting an info session to advertise their opportunities and share more about working at the company. Details and registration can be found in Handshake.(https://rpi.joinhandshake.com/events/1714735/share_preview)
item.author: Students

item.title: Applications for the CCPD Peer Career Advisor program are open!
item.description: RPI’s Center for Career and Professional Development (CCPD) is seeking energetic, positive, proactive students to fill Peer Career Advisor (PCA) positions. This position is $16/hour and will be assisting students with career-related topics such as resumes and cover letters, LinkedIn, and internship and job search basics. Apply by Sunday March 16!
item.author: Students

item.title: Naval Nuclear Propulsion Officer Candidate (NUPOC) Info Session | March 13
item.description: Date: Thursday, March 13, 2025 12:00 AM - 2:00 AM - Join us for an informational meeting about opportunities within the premier nuclear organization in the world and earning up to $180,000 while finishing your degree. Pizza will be provided. All students welcome! Doors will be open from 6:00-8:00 PM.
item.author: Students

item.title: Explore Whiteboarding Tools: Webex & Box Canvas | March 18
item.description:
Tuesday, March 18, 2025 1:00 PM2:00 PM - Join this in-person workshop to learn about two DotCIO-supported whiteboarding tools: Webex’s whiteboard feature and Box Canvas. Get an overview of both tools and see how they can enhance your classroom or meetings. Register here by 3/14—space is limited!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
